wikipedia_page.main: Gordon Archbold Slater  D.Mus. FRCO (1896–1979) was an English cathedral organist, who served in Leicester Cathedral and Lincoln Cathedral.He was a composer of organ, piano and choral music.

response: * Gordon Archbold Slater 1919 - 1927 (later organist of Lincoln Cathedral)
*Gordon Archbold Slater 1927–1931 (subsequently organist at Lincoln Cathedral 1931–1966)
Born in Lincoln, he was educated at Lincoln School and studied under Dr Gordon Archbold Slater at Lincoln Cathedral.
